description: Giant monstrous spiders inhabit a domestic setting, with one seated in an armchair. Two additional spiders on the staircase are lowering a minuscule man on a thread towards the seated spider. The spider in the armchair recoils in terror, dropping a large book, presenting an ironic reversal of expectations where a giant creature is terrified by a tiny human. This scene blends the familiar domestic environment with surreal, monstrous beings. The specific situation of a spider being scared by a human being delivered to it is particularly novel.
caption: null
